The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

Director: Bryan Singer
Writers: Simon Kinberg (screenplay), Jane Goldman (story)
Stars: Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Hugh Jackman
Genres: Action | Adventure | Fantasy | Sci-Fi



X-Men.Days.Of.Future.Past.2014.HD-TS.XVID.AC3.HQ.Hive-CM8

Thx Hive

CM8 Doing It Right The First Time

Sources: 

Video: Original Chinese 720p HDCam

Audio: Millenium/Echo
thx

Notes:

Original Cam was better than whats out, noticed it got watermarked from runtime 2min to 4mins
That logo was moving from left to right screen for 2mins, kinda annoying.
As usual the cam was dark, especially the first 17mins which are at night, after that its good.
also the colours were jumping around, some scene have hardly any colour, next low some ok-ish.

Encode:

Noticed quickly there is no way to do one setting for whole movie, had to cut it into pieces
around 20 were necessary, 
they all needed brightening up differently, enhancing colours and adjusting colouring manually afterwards scene by scene
was a mess to find a way through all pieces to get faces looking natural, got nice in the end.
took me cpl hours, even got rid of that watermark,which wasnt easy consider i wanted to make it unnoticable

subs for foreign parts are hardcoded

Audio is lipsync and very nice line
got very nice 
enjoy


Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1700 2pass
Audio: English AC3 2.0 Line
Sample: yes 2 included
